 3166: spawn_request_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3167:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node...~n", []),
 3168:     spawn_request_bif_test(true, node()),
 3169:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node with Node...~n", []),
 3170:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, node()),
 3171:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3172:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 3173:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, Node),
 3174:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3175:     ok.
 3176:                        
 3177: spawn_request_bif_test(Local, Node) ->
 3178: 
 3179:     Me = self(),
 3180: 
 3181:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3182: 
 3183:     T1 = {test, 1},
 3184:     F1 = fun () -> exit({exit, T1}) end,
 3185:     R1 = if Local ->
 3186:                  spawn_request(F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link]);
 3187:             true ->
 3188:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link])
 3189:          end,
 3190:     receive
 3191:         {T1, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3192:             receive
 3193:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3194:                     ok
 3195:             end,
 3196:             receive
 3197:                 {'EXIT', P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3198:                     ok
 3199:             end
 3200:     end,
 3201: 
 3202:     R1b = if Local ->
 3203:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitor, link]);
 3204:             true ->
 3205:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitor, link])
 3206:          end,
 3207:     receive
 3208:         {spawn_reply, R1b, ok, P1b} ->
 3209:             receive
 3210:                 {'DOWN', R1b, process, P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3211:                     ok
 3212:             end,
 3213:             receive
 3214:                 {'EXIT', P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3215:                     ok
 3216:             end
 3217:     end,
 3218: 
 3219:     Ref1c = make_ref(),
 3220:     F1c = fun () -> Me ! Ref1c end,
 3221:     R1c = if Local ->
 3222:                   spawn_request(F1c);
 3223:              true ->
 3224:                   spawn_request(Node, F1c)
 3225:             end,
 3226:     receive
 3227:         {spawn_reply, R1c, ok, _P1c} ->
 3228:             receive Ref1c -> ok end
 3229:     end,
 3230: 
 3231:     R1e = if Local ->
 3232:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}]);
 3233:             true ->
 3234:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}])
 3235:          end,
 3236:     receive
 3237:         {T1, R1e, error, BadOpt1} ->
 3238:             badopt = BadOpt1,
 3239:             ok
 3240:     end,
 3241:     ok = try
 3242:              BadF = fun (X) -> exit({X,T1}) end,
 3243:              if Local ->
 3244:                      spawn_request(BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link]);
 3245:                 true ->
 3246:                      spawn_request(Node, BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link])
 3247:              end,
 3248:              nok
 3249:          catch
 3250:              error:badarg -> ok
 3251:          end,
 3252:     ok = try
 3253:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, F1, [monitor, link], T1),
 3254:              nok
 3255:          catch
 3256:              error:badarg -> ok
 3257:          end,
 3258: 
 3259:     T2 = {test, 2},
 3260:     M2 = erlang,
 3261:     F2 = exit,
 3262:     Reason2 = {exit, T2},
 3263:     Args2 = [Reason2],
 3264:     R2 = if Local ->
 3265:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}]);
 3266:             true ->
 3267:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}])
 3268:             end,
 3269:     receive
 3270:         {T2, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3271:             receive
 3272:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3273:                     ok
 3274:             end,
 3275:             receive
 3276:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3277:                     ok
 3278:             end
 3279:     end,
 3280: 
 3281:     R2b = if Local ->
 3282:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3283:             true ->
 3284:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3285:             end,
 3286:     receive
 3287:         {spawn_reply, R2b, ok, P2b} ->
 3288:             receive
 3289:                 {'DOWN', R2b, process, P2b, Reason2} ->
 3290:                     ok
 3291:             end,
 3292:             receive
 3293:                 {'EXIT', P2b, Reason2} ->
 3294:                     ok

 3442: spawn_request_monitor_demonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3443:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3444:     BlockFun = fun () ->
 3445:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3446:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, 1000),
 3447:                        ok
 3448:                end,
 3449: 
 3450:     %% Block receiver node...
 3451:     spawn_request(Node, BlockFun, [{priority,max}, link]),
 3452:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3453: 
 3454:     erlang:yield(),
 3455:     R = spawn_request(Node, timer, sleep, [10000], [monitor]),
 3456:     %% Should not be possible to demonitor
 3457:     %% before operation has succeeded...
 3458:     {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3459:     false = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]), %% Should be ignored by VM...
 3460:     receive
 3461:         {spawn_reply, R, ok, P} ->
 3462:             {monitors, [{process,P}]} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3463:             true = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]),
 3464:             {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3465:             exit(P, kill)
 3466:     end,
 3467:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3468:     ok.
 3469: 
 3470: spawn_request_monitor_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3471:     %% Early child exit...
 3472:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3473:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [monitor, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3474:     receive
 3475:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3476:             receive
 3477:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3478:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3479:             end
 3480:     end,
 3481:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3482:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, monitor]),
 3483:     receive
 3484:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3485:             receive
 3486:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3487:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3488:             end
 3489:     end,
 3490:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3491:     ok.
 3492: 
 3493: spawn_request_link_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3494:     %% Early child exit...
 3495:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3496:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3497:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, link]),
 3498:     receive
 3499:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3500:             receive
 3501:                 {'EXIT', P1, Reason1} ->
 3502:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3503:             end
 3504:     end,
 3505:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3506:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [link, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3507:     receive
 3508:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3509:             receive
 3510:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3511:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3512:             end
 3513:     end,
 3514:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3515:     ok.
 3516: 
 3517: spawn_request_link_parent_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3518:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), false),
 3519:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3520:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, false),
 3521:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3522:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3523: 
 3524: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_compound_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3525:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), true),
 3526:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3527:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, true),
 3528:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3529:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3530: 
 3531: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, CompoundExitReason) ->
 3532:     %% Early parent exit...
 3533:     Tester = self(),
 3534: 
 3535:     ExitReason = if CompoundExitReason -> "kaboom";
 3536:                     true -> kaboom
 3537:                  end,
 3538: 
 3539:     verify_nc(node()),
 3540: 
 3541:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3542:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3543: 
 3544:     ParentFun = case node() == Node of
 3545:                     true ->
 3546:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3547:                                 spawn_request(?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3548:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3549:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3550:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3551:                         end;
 3552:                     false ->
 3553:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3554:                                 spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3555:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3556:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3557:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3558:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3559:                         end
 3560:                 end,
 3561:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3562:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3563:                                             %% Give parent some work to do when
 3564:                                             %% exiting and by this increase
 3565:                                             %% possibilities for races...
 3566:                                             T = ets:new(x,[]),
 3567:                                             ets:insert(T, lists:map(fun (I) ->
 3568:                                                                             {I,I}
 3569:                                                                     end,
 3570:                                                                     lists:seq(1,10000))),
 3571:                                             ParentFun(N rem 10) end,
 3572:                                     [{priority, max}])
 3573:                   end,
 3574:                   lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 3575:     N = gather_parent_exits(ExitReason, false),
 3576:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3577:                     fun () ->
 3578:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3579:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3580:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3581:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3582:                                       end, processes())
 3583:                     end),
 3584:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3585:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3586:                       (_) ->
 3587:                           ok
 3588:                   end, CFs),
 3589:     Comment =
 3590:         "Got "
 3591:         ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3592:         ++ if node() == Node -> " node local";
 3593:                   true -> " node remote"
 3594:            end
 3595:         ++ if CompoundExitReason -> " \"kaboom\"";
 3596:               true -> " \'kaboom\'"
 3597:            end
 3598:         ++ " exits!",
 3599:     erlang:display(Comment),
 3600:     Comment.
 3601: 
 3602: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3603:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3604:     N = 1000,
 3605:     ExitCounter = spawn(Node, fun exit_counter/0),
 3606:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 3607:                           spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node)
 3608:                   end,
 3609:                   lists:seq(1, N)),
 3610:     ResRef = make_ref(),
 3611:     ExitCounter ! {get_results, self(), ResRef},
 3612:     Cmnt = receive
 3613:                {ResRef, CntMap} ->
 3614:                    lists:flatten(
 3615:                      ["In total ", integer_to_list(N), " exits. ",
 3616:                       "Detected exits: ",
 3617:                       maps:fold(fun (ExitReason, Count, "") ->
 3618:                                         io_lib:format("~p exit ~p times",
 3619:                                                       [ExitReason, Count]);
 3620:                                     (ExitReason, Count, Acc) ->
 3621:                                         [Acc, io_lib:format("; ~p exit ~p times",
 3622:                                                             [ExitReason, Count])]
 3623:                                 end,
 3624:                                 "",
 3625:                                 CntMap),
 3626:                       "."])
 3627:            end,
 3628:     io:format("~s~n", [Cmnt]),
 3629:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3630:     {comment, Cmnt}.
 3631: 
 3632: exit_counter() ->
 3633:     true = register(exit_counter, self()),
 3634:     exit_counter(#{}).
 3635: 
 3636: exit_counter(CntMap) ->
 3637:     receive
 3638:         {get_results, From, Ref} ->
 3639:             From ! {Ref, CntMap};
 3640:         {exit, Reason} ->
 3641:             OldCnt = maps:get(Reason, CntMap, 0),
 3642:             exit_counter(CntMap#{Reason => OldCnt+1})
 3643:     end.
 3644: 
 3645: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node) ->
 3646:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 3647:     ChildFun = fun () ->
 3648:                        process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3649:                        receive
 3650:                            {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3651:                                exit_counter ! {exit, Reason}
 3652:                        end
 3653:                end,
 3654:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3655:                                        _ReqID = spawn_request(Node,
 3656:                                                               ChildFun,
 3657:                                                               [link,
 3658:                                                                {priority,max}]),
 3659:                                        exit(bye)
 3660:                                end),
 3661:     receive
 3662:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3663:             bye = Reason,
 3664:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node)
 3665:     end,
 3666:     ok.
 3667: 
 3668: 
 3669: spawn_request_abandon_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3670:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3671:     false = spawn_request_abandon(make_ref()),
 3672:     false = spawn_request_abandon(spawn_request(fun () -> ok end)),
 3673:     false = spawn_request_abandon(rpc:call(Node, erlang, make_ref, [])),
 3674:     try
 3675:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(self()) 
 3676:     catch
 3677:         error:badarg ->
 3678:             ok
 3679:     end,
 3680:     try
 3681:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(4711)
 3682:     catch
 3683:         error:badarg ->
 3684:             ok
 3685:     end,
 3686: 
 3687:     verify_nc(node()),
 3688: 
 3689:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3690:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3691: 
 3692: 
 3693:     TotOps = 1000,
 3694:     Tester = self(),
 3695: 
 3696:     ParentFun = fun (Wait, Opts) ->
 3697:                         ReqId = spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3698:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3699:                                               [Tester], Opts),
 3700:                         receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3701:                         case spawn_request_abandon(ReqId) of
 3702:                             true ->
 3703:                                 ok;
 3704:                             false ->
 3705:                                 receive
 3706:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, _} ->
 3707:                                         exit(spawn_failed);
 3708:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, Pid} ->
 3709:                                         unlink(Pid),
 3710:                                         exit(Pid, bye)
 3711:                                 after
 3712:                                     0 ->
 3713:                                         exit(missing_spawn_reply)
 3714:                                 end
 3715:                         end
 3716:                 end,
 3717:     %% Parent exit early...
 3718:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3719:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3720:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link])
 3721:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3722:                   end,
 3723:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3724:     NoA1 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3725:     %% Parent exit late...
 3726:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3727:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3728:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link]),
 3729:                                             receive
 3730:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3731:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3732:                                             after
 3733:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3734:                                             end
 3735:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3736:                   end,
 3737:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3738:     NoA2 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3739:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3740:                     fun () ->
 3741:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3742:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3743:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3744:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3745:                                       end, processes())
 3746:                     end),
 3747:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3748:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3749:                       (_) ->
 3750:                           ok
 3751:                   end, CFs),
 3752:     %% Parent exit early...
 3753:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3754:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3755:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [])
 3756:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3757:                   end,
 3758:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3759:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3760:     %% Parent exit late...
 3761:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3762:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3763:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, []),
 3764:                                             receive
 3765:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3766:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3767:                                             after
 3768:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3769:                                             end
 3770:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3771:                   end,
 3772:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3773:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3774:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3775:     C = "Got " ++ integer_to_list(NoA1) ++ " and "
 3776:         ++ integer_to_list(NoA2) ++ " abandoneds of 2*"
 3777:         ++ integer_to_list(TotOps) ++ " ops!",
 3778:     true = NoA1 /= 0,
 3779:     true = NoA1 /= TotOps,
 3780:     true = NoA2 /= 0,
 3781:     true = NoA2 /= TotOps,
 3782:     {comment, C}.
 3783: 
 3784: spawn_request_test_exit_child(Tester) ->
 3785:   Child = self(),
 3786:   _ = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3787:                         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3788:                         receive
 3789:                             {'EXIT', Child, Reason} ->
 3790:                                 Tester ! {parent_exit, Reason}
 3791:                         end
 3792:                 end, [link,{priority,max}]),
 3793:   receive after infinity -> ok end.
 3794: 
 3795: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther) ->
 3796:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3797:     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, 0).
 3798: 
 3799: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N) ->
 3800:     receive
 3801:         {parent_exit, Reason} ->
 3802:             gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N+1);
 3803:         {parent_exit, _} = ParentExit ->
 3804:             case AllowOther of
 3805:                 false ->
 3806:                     ct:fail(ParentExit);
 3807:                 true ->
 3808:                     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N)
 3809:             end
 3810:     after 0 ->
 3811:             N
 3812:     end.
 3813: dist_spawn_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3814:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3815:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3816:     receive
 3817:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3818:             receive
 3819:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3820:                     hej = Reason1
 3821:             end
 3822:     end,
 3823:     {P2, Mon2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3824:     receive
 3825:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3826:             hej = Reason2
 3827:     end,
 3828:     {P3, Mon3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3829:     receive
 3830:         {'DOWN', Mon3, process, P3, Reason3} ->
 3831:             hej = Reason3
 3832:     end,
 3833:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3834:     ok.
 3835: 
 3836: spawn_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3837:     %% Spawn against an ei node which does not support spawn
 3838:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 3839:     try
 3840:         %% First spawn triggering a new connection; which
 3841:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3842:         %% of spawn requests...
 3843:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3844:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, true),
 3845:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3846:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3847:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, false),
 3848:         ok
 3849:     after
 3850:         ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode)
 3851:     end.
 3852: 
 3853: spawn_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3854:     %% Same spawn tests against a two releases old node as against
 3855:     %% ei node above
 3856:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 3857:     OldRelName = OldRel ++ "_latest",
 3858:     %% We clear all ERL_FLAGS for the old node as all options may not
 3859:     %% be supported.
 3860:     ClearEnv = lists:foldl(
 3861:                  fun({Key,_Value}, Acc) ->
 3862:                          case re:run(Key,"^ERL_.*FLAGS$") of
 3863:                              {match,_} ->
 3864:                                  [{Key,""}|Acc];
 3865:                              nomatch ->
 3866:                                  Acc
 3867:                          end
 3868:                  end, [], os:env()),
 3869:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0, env => ClearEnv },
 3870:                       OldRelName,
 3871:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 3872: 	not_available ->
 3873:             {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
 3874:         {ok, Peer, OldNode} ->
 3875:             try
 3876:                 %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3877:                 %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3878:                 %% of spawn requests...
 3879:                 io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3880:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, true),
 3881:                 io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3882:                 %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3883:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, false),
 3884:                 ok
 3885:             after
 3886:                 peer:stop(Peer)
 3887:             end
 3888:     end.
 3889: 
 3890: spawn_against_new_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3891:     {ok, Peer, CurrNode} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3892:     try
 3893:         %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3894:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3895:         %% of spawn requests...
 3896:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3897:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, true),
 3898:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3899:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3900:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, false),
 3901:         ok
 3902:     after
 3903:         peer:stop(Peer)
 3904:     end.
 3905: 
 3906: spawn_ei_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3907:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() against ei node...", []),
 3908:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3909:     Ref1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3910:     receive
 3911:         {a_tag, Ref1, Err, Notsup} ->
 3912:             error = Err,
 3913:             notsup = Notsup,
 3914:             ok
 3915:     end,
 3916:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor() against ei node...", []),
 3917:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3918:     try
 3919:         spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej])
 3920:     catch
 3921:         error:notsup ->
 3922:             ok
 3923:     end,
 3924:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor against ei node...", []),
 3925:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3926:     {P0, M0} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3927:     receive
 3928:         {'DOWN', M0, process, P0, R0} ->
 3929:             notsup = R0
 3930:     end,
 3931:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link against ei node...", []),
 3932:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3933:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3934:     P1 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3935:     receive
 3936:         {'EXIT', P1, R1} ->
 3937:             notsup = R1
 3938:     end,
 3939:     io:format("Testing spawn_link() against ei node...", []),
 3940:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3941:     P2 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3942:     receive
 3943:         {'EXIT', P2, R2} ->
 3944:             notsup = R2
 3945:     end,
 3946:     ok.
 3947: 
 3948: disconnect_node(_Node, false) ->
 3949:     ok;
 3950: disconnect_node(Node, true) ->
 3951:     lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) andalso begin
 3952:         monitor_node(Node, true),
 3953:         true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 3954:         receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end
 3955:     end.
 3956: 
 3957: spawn_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 3958:     io:format("Testing spawn_request()...", []),
 3959:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3960:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 3961:     receive
 3962:         {a_tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3963:             Node = node(P1),
 3964:             receive
 3965:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, hej} -> ok
 3966:             end
 3967:     end,
 3968:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor()...", []),
 3969:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3970:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3971:     receive
 3972:         {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, hej} -> ok
 3973:     end,
 3974:     Node = node(P2),
 3975:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor...", []),
 3976:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3977:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3978:     receive
 3979:         {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, hej} -> ok
 3980:     end,
 3981:     Node = node(P3),
 3982:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link...", []),
 3983:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3984:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3985:     P4 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 3986:     Node = node(P4),
 3987:     receive
 3988:         {'EXIT', P4, hej} ->
 3989:             ok
 3990:     end,
 3991:     io:format("Testing spawn_link()...", []),
 3992:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 3993:     P5 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3994:     Node = node(P5),
 3995:     receive
 3996:         {'EXIT', P5, hej} ->
 3997:             ok
 3998:     end.
 3999: 
 4000: spawn_request_reply_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4001:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(undefined, node()),
 4002:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4003:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node).
 4004:     
 4005: spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node) ->
 4006:     io:format("Testing on node: ~p~n", [Node]),
 4007:     Parent = self(),
 4008:     Done1 = make_ref(),
 4009:     RID1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done1 end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4010:     receive Done1 -> ok end,
 4011:     receive
 4012:         {spawn_reply, RID1, ok, _} -> ok
 4013:     after 0 ->
 4014:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4015:     end,
 4016:     Done2 = make_ref(),
 4017:     RID2 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done2 end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4018:     receive Done2 -> ok end,
 4019:     receive
 4020:         {spawn_reply, RID2, ok, _} -> ok
 4021:     after 0 ->
 4022:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4023:     end,
 4024:     Done3 = make_ref(),
 4025:     RID3 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done3 end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4026:     receive Done3 -> ok end,
 4027:     receive
 4028:         {spawn_reply, RID3, _, _} ->
 4029:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4030:     after 0 ->
 4031:             ok
 4032:     end,
 4033:     Done4 = make_ref(),
 4034:     RID4 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done4 end, [{reply, no}]),
 4035:     receive Done4 -> ok end,
 4036:     receive
 4037:         {spawn_reply, RID4, _, _} ->
 4038:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4039:     after 0 ->
 4040:             ok
 4041:     end,
 4042:     RID5 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}, bad_option]),
 4043:     receive
 4044:         {spawn_reply, RID5, error, badopt} -> ok
 4045:     end,
 4046:     RID6 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}, bad_option]),
 4047:     receive
 4048:         {spawn_reply, RID6, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4049:     after 1000 -> ok
 4050:     end,
 4051:     RID7 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}, bad_option]),
 4052:     receive
 4053:         {spawn_reply, RID7, error, badopt} -> ok
 4054:     end,
 4055:     RID8 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}, bad_option]),
 4056:     receive
 4057:         {spawn_reply, RID8, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4058:     after 1000 -> ok
 4059:     end,
 4060:     RID8_1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, nahh}]),
 4061:     receive
 4062:         {spawn_reply, RID8_1, error, badopt} -> ok
 4063:     end,
 4064:     case Node == node() of
 4065:         true ->
 4066:             ok;
 4067:         false ->
 4068:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4069:             RID9 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4070:             receive
 4071:                 {spawn_reply, RID9, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4072:             end,
 4073:             RID10 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4074:             receive
 4075:                 {spawn_reply, RID10, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4076:             after 1000 -> ok
 4077:             end,
 4078:             RID11 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4079:             receive
 4080:                 {spawn_reply, RID11, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4081:             end,
 4082:             RID12 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}]),
 4083:             receive
 4084:                 {spawn_reply, RID12, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4085:             after 1000 -> ok
 4086:             end,
 4087:             ok
 4088:     end.
 4089: 
 4090: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4091:     %% A process newly spawned via the distribution is passed the
 4092:     %% argument list to use as the first message followed by an intialization
 4093:     %% message. Those two messages *must* be the first messages in its queue
 4094:     %% when it begins execution. The parallel receive/send signal optimization
 4095:     %% could potentially cause reordering of messages if certain future
 4096:     %% changes are made. This test case tries to cause a situation where a
 4097:     %% message reordering potentially could happen, and hopefully will detect
 4098:     %% such problematic changes.
 4099:     Tester = self(),
 4100:     NoScheds = 8,
 4101:     NoSchedsStr = integer_to_list(NoScheds),
 4102:     NoSchedsList = lists:seq(1, NoScheds),
 4103:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+S"++NoSchedsStr++":"++NoSchedsStr]),
 4104:     AttackMsg = make_ref(),
 4105:     AttackArgList = [Tester, AttackMsg],
 4106:     OkMsg = make_ref(),
 4107:     As = lists:map(
 4108:            fun (_) ->
 4109:                    spawn_opt(
 4110:                      Node,
 4111:                      fun () ->
 4112:                              dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(AttackArgList,
 4113:                                                               1000)
 4114:                      end, [{priority, high}, link])
 4115:            end, NoSchedsList),
 4116:     Relay = spawn_opt(
 4117:               Node,
 4118:               fun () ->
 4119:                       receive
 4120:                           {attack, Victim} ->
 4121:                               lists:foreach(fun (A) ->
 4122:                                                     A ! {attack, Victim}
 4123:                                             end, As)
 4124:                       end
 4125:               end, [{priority, max}, link]),
 4126:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 4127:     Victim = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, send, [Tester, OkMsg],
 4128:                        [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4129:                         {priority, normal},
 4130:                         link]),
 4131:     Relay ! {attack, Victim},
 4132:     receive
 4133:         OkMsg ->
 4134:             ok;
 4135:         AttackMsg ->
 4136:             ct:fail(child_process_used_message_as_argument_list)
 4137:     end,
 4138:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 4139:                           unlink(P)
 4140:                   end, [Victim] ++ [Relay] ++ As),
 4141:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4142:     ok.
 4143: 
 4144: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N) ->
 4145:     receive
 4146:         {attack, Victim} ->
 4147:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Victim, Msg, N)
 4148:     after
 4149:         0 ->
 4150:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N)
 4151:     end.
 4152: 
 4153: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(_Pid, _Msg, 0) ->
 4154:     ok;
 4155: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N) ->
 4156:     Pid ! Msg,
 4157:     dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N-1).
 4158: 
 4159: processes_term_proc_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4160:     Tester = self(),
 4161: 
 4162:     Run = fun(Args) ->
 4163:               {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 4164:               RT = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 4165:                               receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4166:                               as_expected = processes_term_proc_list_test(false),
 4167:                               Tester ! {it_worked, self()}
 4168:                       end),
 4169:               receive {it_worked, RT} -> ok end,
 4170:               stop_node(Peer, Node)
 4171:           end,
 4172: 
 4173:     %% We have to run this test case with +S1 since instrument:allocations()
 4174:     %% will report a free()'d block as present until it's actually deallocated
 4175:     %% by its employer.
 4176:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "false", "+S1"]),
 4177:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "true", "+S1"]),
 4178: 
 4179:     ok.
 4180: 
 4181: %% OTP-18322: Send msg to spawning process pid returned from processes/0
 4182: processes_send_infant(_Config) ->
 4183:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 4184:         1 ->
 4185:             {skip, "Only one scheduler online"};
 4186:         NScheds ->
 4187:             processes_send_infant_do(NScheds)
 4188:     end.
 4189: 
 4190: processes_send_infant_do(NScheds) ->
 4191:     IgnoreList = erlang:processes(),
 4192:     IgnorePids = maps:from_keys(IgnoreList, ignore),
 4193:     Tester = self(),
 4194: 
 4195:     %% To provoke bug we need sender and spawner on different schedulers.
 4196:     %% Let spawners use schedulers nr 2 to NScheds
 4197:     NSpawnerScheds = NScheds - 1,
 4198:     NSpawners = 2 * NSpawnerScheds,
 4199:     [spawn_link(fun() ->
 4200:                         processes_send_infant_spawner((I rem  NSpawnerScheds) + 2,
 4201:                                                       Tester, Tester, 1)
 4202:                 end)
 4203:      || I <- lists:seq(0, NSpawners-1)],
 4204: 
 4205:     %% and make sure sender use scheduler 1
 4206:     {Sender,SenderMon} =
 4207:         spawn_opt(
 4208:           fun() ->
 4209:                   timeout = processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4210:           end,
 4211:           [link, monitor, {scheduler,1}]),
 4212: 
 4213:     %% Run test for a little while and see if VM crashes
 4214:     {ok, _TRef} = timer:send_after(1000, Sender, timeout),
 4215:     {'DOWN', SenderMon, process, Sender, normal} = receive_any(),
 4216: 
 4217:     %% Stop spawners and collect stats
 4218:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4219:                                     {processes_send_infant, stop},
 4220:                                     IgnorePids),
 4221:     {TotSpawn, TheLastOfUs} =
 4222:         lists:foldl(fun(_, {SpawnCnt, Pids}) ->
 4223:                             {Pid, Generation} = receive_any(),
 4224:                             io:format("Got ~p from ~p\n", [Generation, Pid]),
 4225:                             {SpawnCnt+Generation, [Pid | Pids]}
 4226:                     end,
 4227:                     {0, []},
 4228:                     lists:seq(1, NSpawners)),
 4229:     io:format("Total spawned processes: ~p\n", [TotSpawn]),
 4230:     Aliens = (erlang:processes() -- IgnoreList) -- TheLastOfUs,
 4231:     io:format("Alien processes: ~p\n", [Aliens]),
 4232:     ok.
 4233: 
 4234: 
 4235: 
 4236: processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids) ->
 4237:     %% Send message identifying this test case, in case we send
 4238:     %% to alien processes spawned during the test.
 4239:     Msg = processes_send_infant,
 4240:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4241:                                     Msg,
 4242:                                     IgnorePids),
 4243:     receive timeout -> timeout
 4244:     after 0 ->
 4245:             processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4246:     end.
 4247: 
 4248: processes_send_infant_broadcast([Pid | Tail], Msg, IgnorePids) ->
 4249:     case maps:is_key(Pid, IgnorePids) of
 4250:         false ->
 4251:             Pid ! Msg;
 4252:         true ->
 4253:             ignore
 4254:     end,
 4255:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(Tail, Msg, IgnorePids);
 4256: processes_send_infant_broadcast([], _, _) ->
 4257:     ok.
 4258: 
 4259: processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester, Parent, Generation) ->
 4260:     link(Tester),
 4261:     case receive_any() of
 4262:         processes_send_infant ->
 4263:             case Parent of
 4264:                 Tester -> ok;
 4265:                 _ -> Parent ! {die, self()}
 4266:             end,
 4267:             Self = self(),
 4268:             Child = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 4269:                                       processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester,
 4270:                                                                     Self,
 4271:                                                                     Generation+1)
 4272:                               end,
 4273:                              [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4274:                               {scheduler, Sched}]),
 4275:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4276: 
 4277:         {processes_send_infant, stop} ->
 4278:             Tester ! {self(), Generation}
 4279:     end.
 4280: 
 4281: process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child) ->
 4282:     %% Parent stays alive only to ensure child gets stop message
 4283:     case receive_any() of
 4284:         processes_send_infant ->
 4285:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4286:         {die, Child} ->
 4287:             ok;
 4288:         {processes_send_infant, stop}=Stop ->
 4289:             %% We are not sure child was spawned when stop message was sent
 4290:             %% so we relay it.
 4291:             Child ! Stop
 4292:     end.
 4293: 
 4294: 
 4295: -define(CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MC, XB),
 4296: 	chk_term_proc_list(?LINE, MC, XB)).
 4297: 
 4298: chk_term_proc_list(Line, MustChk, ExpectBlks) ->
 4299:     Allocs = instrument:allocations(),
 4300:     case {MustChk, Allocs} of
 4301: 	{false, {error, not_enabled}} ->
 4302: 	    not_enabled;
 4303: 	{false, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} when ByOrigin =:= #{} ->
 4304: 	    not_enabled;
 4305: 	{_, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} ->
 4306:             ByType = maps:get(system, ByOrigin, #{}),
 4307:             Hist = maps:get(ptab_list_deleted_el, ByType, {}),
 4308: 	    case lists:sum(tuple_to_list(Hist)) of
 4309: 		ExpectBlks ->
 4310:                     ok;
 4311: 		Blks ->
 4312:                     exit({line, Line, mismatch,
 4313:                           expected, ExpectBlks,
 4314:                           actual, Blks})
 4315: 	    end
 4316:     end,
 4317:     ok.
 4318: 
 4319: processes_term_proc_list_test(MustChk) ->
 4320:     Tester = self(),
 4321:     enable_internal_state(),
 4322:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 4323:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 4324:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 4325:     #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 4326: 	tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 4327: 	tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 4328:     } = PBInfo,
 4329:     true = Chunks > 1,
 4330:     true = Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds,
 4331:     Processes = fun () ->
 4332: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 4333: 		WantReds),
 4334: 	    processes()
 4335:     end,
 4336:     Exit = fun (P) ->
 4337: 	    unlink(P),
 4338: 	    exit(P, bang),
 4339: 	    wait_until(
 4340: 		fun () ->
 4341: 			not lists:member(
 4342: 			    P,
 4343: 			    erts_debug:get_internal_state(
 4344: 				processes))
 4345: 		end)
 4346:     end,
 4347:     SpawnSuspendProcessesProc = fun () ->
 4348: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4349: 		  P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4350: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 4351: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 4352: 						   done,
 4353: 						   hd(Processes())},
 4354: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 4355: 				 end),
 4356: 		  receive {suspend_me, P} -> ok end,
 4357: 		  erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4358: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4359: 		  [{status,suspended},
 4360: 		   {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 4361: 		      = process_info(P, [status, current_function]),
 4362: 		  P
 4363: 	  end,
 4364:     ResumeProcessesProc = fun (P) ->
 4365: 					erlang:resume_process(P),
 4366: 					receive {P, done, _} -> ok end
 4367: 				end,
 4368:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4369:     HangAround = fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4370:     HA1 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4371:     HA2 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4372:     HA3 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4373:     S1 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4374:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4375:     Exit(HA1),
 4376:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4377:     S2 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4378:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4379:     S3 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4380:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4381:     Exit(HA2),
 4382:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4383:     S4 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4384:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4385:     Exit(HA3),
 4386:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4387:     ResumeProcessesProc(S1),
 4388:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4389:     ResumeProcessesProc(S3),
 4390:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4391:     ResumeProcessesProc(S4),
 4392:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4393:     ResumeProcessesProc(S2),
 4394:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4395:     Exit(S1),
 4396:     Exit(S2),
 4397:     Exit(S3),
 4398:     Exit(S4),
 4399: 
 4400: 
 4401:     HA4 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4402:     HA5 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4403:     HA6 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4404:     S5 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4405:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4406:     Exit(HA4),
 4407:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4408:     S6 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4409:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4410:     Exit(HA5),
 4411:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4412:     S7 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4413:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4414:     Exit(HA6),
 4415:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4416:     S8 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4417:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4418: 
 4419:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4420:     Exit(S8),
 4421:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4422:     Exit(S5),
 4423:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4424:     Exit(S7),
 4425:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4426:     Exit(S6),
 4427:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4428:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4429:     as_expected.
 4430: 
 4431: 
 4432: otp_7738_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4433:     otp_7738_test(waiting).
 4434: 
 4435: otp_7738_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4436:     otp_7738_test(suspended).
 4437: 
 4438: otp_7738_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4439:     otp_7738_test(resume).
 4440: 
 4441: otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4442:     sys_mem_cond_run(3072, fun () -> do_otp_7738_test(Type) end).
 4443: 
 4444: do_otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4445:     T = self(),
 4446:     S = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4447: 		receive
 4448: 		    {suspend, Suspendee} ->
 4449: 			erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 4450: 			T ! {suspended, Suspendee},
 4451: 			receive
 4452: 			after 10 ->
 4453: 				erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 4454: 				Suspendee ! wake_up
 4455: 			end;
 4456: 		    {send, To, Msg} ->
 4457: 			receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4458: 			To ! Msg
 4459: 		end
 4460: 	end),
 4461:     R = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4462: 		X = lists:seq(1, 20000000),
 4463: 		T ! {initialized, self()},
 4464: 		case Type of
 4465: 		    _ when Type == suspended;
 4466: 		Type == waiting ->
 4467: 		    receive _ -> ok end;
 4468: 		_ when Type == resume ->
 4469: 		    Receive = fun (F) ->
 4470: 			    receive
 4471: 				_ ->
 4472: 				    ok
 4473: 			    after 0 ->
 4474: 				    F(F)
 4475: 			    end
 4476: 		    end,
 4477: 		    Receive(Receive)
 4478: 	    end,
 4479: 	    T ! {woke_up, self()},
 4480: 	    id(X)
 4481:     end),
 4482:     receive {initialized, R} -> ok end,
 4483:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4484:     case Type of
 4485: 	      suspended ->
 4486: 		  erlang:suspend_process(R),
 4487: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4488: 	      waiting ->
 4489: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4490: 	      resume ->
 4491: 		  S ! {suspend, R},
 4492: 		  receive {suspended, R} -> ok end
 4493: 	  end,
 4494:     erlang:garbage_collect(R),
 4495:     case Type of
 4496: 	      suspended ->
 4497: 		  erlang:resume_process(R);
 4498: 	      _ ->
 4499: 		  ok
 4500: 	  end,
 4501:     receive
 4502: 	      {woke_up, R} ->
 4503: 		  ok
 4504: 	  after 2000 ->
 4505: 		  I = process_info(R, [status, message_queue_len]),
 4506: 		  io:format("~p~n", [I]),
 4507: 		  ct:fail(no_progress)
 4508: 	  end,
 4509:     ok.
 4510: 
 4511: gor(Reds, Stop) ->
 4512:     receive
 4513: 	drop_me ->
 4514: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);	    
 4515: 	{From, reds} ->
 4516: 	    From ! {reds, Reds, self()},
 4517: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);
 4518: 	{From, Stop} ->
 4519: 	    From ! {stopped, Stop, Reds, self()}
 4520:     after 0 ->
 4521: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop)
 4522:     end.
 4523: 
 4524: garb_other_running(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4525:     Stop = make_ref(),
 4526:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> gor(0, Stop) end),
 4527:     Reds = lists:foldl(fun (N, OldReds) ->
 4528: 			             case N rem 2 of
 4529: 					 0 -> Pid ! drop_me;
 4530: 					 _ -> ok
 4531: 				     end,
 4532: 				     erlang:garbage_collect(Pid),
 4533: 				     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4534: 				     Pid ! {self(), reds},
 4535: 				     receive
 4536: 					       {reds, NewReds, Pid} ->
 4537: 						   true = (NewReds > OldReds),
 4538: 						   NewReds
 4539: 					   end
 4540: 			     end,
 4541: 			     0,
 4542: 			     lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4543:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4544:     Pid ! {self(), Stop},
 4545:     receive
 4546: 	      {stopped, Stop, StopReds, Pid} ->
 4547: 		  true = (StopReds > Reds)
 4548: 	  end,
 4549:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 4550:     ok.
 4551: 
 4552: no_priority_inversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4553:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4554:     Master = self(),
 4555:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4556:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4557: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4558:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4559: 					       tok_loop()
 4560: 				       end,
 4561: 				       [{priority, high},
 4562:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4563:                                         monitor,
 4564:                                         link])
 4565: 		     end,
 4566: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4567:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, HTLs),
 4568:     LTL = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4569: 			    tok_loop()
 4570: 		    end,
 4571: 		    [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4572:     false = erlang:check_process_code(element(1, LTL), nonexisting_module),
 4573:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(element(1, LTL)),
 4574:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4575: 			  unlink(P),
 4576: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4577: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4578:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4579: 			  receive
 4580: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4581: 				  ok
 4582: 			  end
 4583: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4584:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4585:     ok.
 4586: 
 4587: no_priority_inversion2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4588:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4589:     Master = self(),
 4590:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4591:     MTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4592: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4593:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4594: 					       tok_loop()
 4595: 				       end,
 4596: 				       [{priority, max},
 4597:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4598:                                         monitor, link])
 4599: 		     end,
 4600: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4601:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, MTLs),
 4602:     {PL, ML} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4603: 			       tok_loop()
 4604: 		       end,
 4605: 		       [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4606:     RL = request_test(PL, low),
 4607:     RN = request_test(PL, normal),
 4608:     RH = request_test(PL, high),
 4609:     receive
 4610: 	{system_task_test, _, _} ->
 4611: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_system_task_completed)
 4612:     after 1000 ->
 4613: 	    ok
 4614:     end,
 4615:     RM = request_test(PL, max),
 4616:     receive
 4617: 	{system_task_test, RM, true} ->
 4618: 	    ok
 4619:     end,
 4620:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4621: 			  unlink(P),
 4622: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4623: 		  end, MTLs),
 4624:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4625: 			  receive
 4626: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4627: 				  ok
 4628: 			  end
 4629: 		  end, MTLs),
 4630:     receive
 4631: 	{system_task_test, RH, true} ->
 4632: 	    ok
 4633:     end,
 4634:     receive
 4635: 	{system_task_test, RN, true} ->
 4636: 	    ok
 4637:     end,
 4638:     receive
 4639: 	{system_task_test, RL, true} ->
 4640: 	    ok
 4641:     end,
 4642:     unlink(PL),
 4643:     exit(PL, kill),
 4644:     receive
 4645: 	{'DOWN', ML, process, PL, killed} ->
 4646: 	    ok
 4647:     end,
 4648:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4649:     ok.
 4650: 
 4651: request_test(Pid, Prio) ->
 4652:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4653:     erts_internal:request_system_task(Pid, Prio, {system_task_test, Ref}),
 4654:     Ref.
 4655: 
 4656: system_task_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4657:     Me = self(),
 4658:     GCReq = fun () ->
 4659: 		    RL = test_req(Me, 100),
 4660: 		    lists:foreach(fun (R) ->
 4661: 					  receive
 4662: 					      {system_task_test, R, true} ->
 4663: 						  ok
 4664: 					  end
 4665: 				  end, RL),
 4666: 		    exit(it_worked)
 4667: 	    end,
 4668:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (_) -> spawn_monitor(GCReq) end, lists:seq(1, 1000)),
 4669:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4670: 			  receive
 4671: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, it_worked} ->
 4672: 				  ok
 4673: 			  end
 4674: 		  end, HTLs),
 4675:     ok.
 4676: 
 4677: test_req(_Pid, 0) ->
 4678:     [];
 4679: test_req(Pid, N) ->
 4680:     R0 = request_test(Pid, low),
 4681:     R1 = request_test(Pid, normal),
 4682:     R2 = request_test(Pid, high),
 4683:     R3 = request_test(Pid, max),
 4684:     [R0, R1, R2, R3 | test_req(Pid, N-1)].
 4685: 
 4686: system_task_on_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4687:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 4688: 				   tok_loop()
 4689: 			   end),
 4690:     true = erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4691:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4692:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(P),
 4693:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4694:     true = erlang:resume_process(P),
 4695:     false = ({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)),
 4696:     exit(P, kill),
 4697:     receive
 4698: 	{'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4699: 	    ok
 4700:     end.
 4701: 
 4702: %% When a system task couldn't be enqueued due to the process being in an
 4703: %% incompatible state, it would linger in the system task list and get executed
 4704: %% anyway the next time the process was scheduled. This would result in a
 4705: %% double-free at best.
 4706: %%
 4707: %% This test continuously purges modules while other processes run dirty code,
 4708: %% which will provoke this error as ERTS_PSTT_CPC can't be enqueued while a
 4709: %% process is running dirty code.
 4710: system_task_failed_enqueue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4711:     case erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) of
 4712:         N when N > 0 ->
 4713:             system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config);
 4714:         _ ->
 4715:             {skipped, "No dirty scheduler support"}
 4716:     end.
 4717: 
 4718: system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config) ->
 4719:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4720: 
 4721:     Purgers = [spawn_link(fun() -> purge_loop(Priv, Id) end)
 4722:                || Id <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers))],
 4723:     Hogs = [spawn_link(fun() -> dirty_loop() end)
 4724:             || _ <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers))],
 4725: 
 4726:     ct:sleep(5000),
 4727: 
 4728:     [begin
 4729:          unlink(Pid),
 4730:          exit(Pid, kill)
 4731:      end || Pid <- (Purgers ++ Hogs)],
 4732: 
 4733:     ok.
 4734: 
 4735: purge_loop(PrivDir, Id) ->
 4736:     Mod = "failed_enq_" ++ integer_to_list(Id),
 4737:     Path = PrivDir ++ "/" ++ Mod,
 4738:     file:write_file(Path ++ ".erl",
 4739:                     "-module('" ++ Mod ++ "').\n" ++
 4740:                         "-export([t/0]).\n" ++
 4741:                         "t() -> ok."),
 4742:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4743: purge_loop_1(Path) ->
 4744:     {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Path, []),
 4745:     erlang:delete_module(Mod),
 4746:     erts_code_purger:purge(Mod),
 4747:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4748: 
 4749: dirty_loop() ->
 4750:     ok = erts_debug:dirty_cpu(reschedule, 10000),
 4751:     dirty_loop().
 4752: 
 4753: gc_request_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4754:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4755:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ref),
 4756:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(immed),
 4757:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS).
 4758: 
 4759: gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ReqIdType) ->
 4760:     Master = self(),
 4761:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4762: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4763: 								    false),
 4764: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4765: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4766: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, true},
 4767: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4768: 								     true),
 4769: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4770: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4771:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4772:     ReqId = case ReqIdType of
 4773:                 ref -> make_ref();
 4774:                 immed -> immed
 4775:             end,
 4776:     async = garbage_collect(P, [{async, ReqId}]),
 4777:     receive
 4778: 	{garbage_collect, ReqId, Result} ->
 4779: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_gc, Result});
 4780: 	{P, gc_state, true} ->
 4781: 	    ok
 4782:     end,
 4783:     receive {garbage_collect, ReqId, true} -> ok end,
 4784:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4785:     ok.
 4786: 
 4787: gc_request_blast_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4788:     Master = self(),
 4789:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4790:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4791: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4792: 								    false),
 4793: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4794: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4795: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4796: 								     true),
 4797: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4798: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4799:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4800:     PMs = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4801: 			    Prio = case N rem 4 of
 4802: 				       0 -> max;
 4803: 				       1 -> high;
 4804: 				       2 -> normal;
 4805: 				       3 -> low
 4806: 				   end,
 4807: 			    spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4808: 					      erlang:garbage_collect(P)
 4809: 				      end, [monitor, link, {priority, Prio}])
 4810: 		    end, lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4811:     lists:foreach(fun ({Proc, Mon}) ->
 4812: 			  receive
 4813: 			      {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc, normal} ->
 4814: 				  ok
 4815: 			  end
 4816: 		  end,
 4817: 		  PMs),
 4818:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS),
 4819:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4820:     ok.
 4821: 
 4822: otp_16436(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4823:     P = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4824:                           erts_debug:dirty_io(wait, 1000)
 4825:                   end,
 4826:                   [{priority,high},link]),
 4827:     erlang:check_process_code(P, non_existing),
 4828:     unlink(P),
 4829:     exit(P, kill),
 4830:     ok.
 4831: 
 4832: otp_16642(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4833:     %%
 4834:     %% Whitebox testing...
 4835:     %%
 4836:     %% Ensure that low prio system tasks are interleaved with
 4837:     %% normal prio system tasks as they should.
 4838:     %%
 4839:     process_flag(priority, high),
 4840:     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 4841:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4842:                     [link, {scheduler, 1}]),
 4843:     ReqSTasks = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4844:                         lists:foreach(
 4845:                           fun (N) ->
 4846:                                   erts_internal:request_system_task(
 4847:                                     Pid,
 4848:                                     Prio,
 4849:                                     {system_task_test,
 4850:                                      {Prio, N}})
 4851:                           end,
 4852:                           lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4853:                 end,
 4854:     MkResList = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4855:                         lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4856:                                           {system_task_test,
 4857:                                            {Prio, N},
 4858:                                            true}
 4859:                                   end,
 4860:                                   lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4861:                 end,
 4862: 
 4863:     %%% Test when normal queue clears first...
 4864: 
 4865:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4866:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 10),
 4867:     ReqSTasks(low, 2, 4),
 4868:     ReqSTasks(normal, 11, 26),
 4869: 
 4870:     Msgs1 = recv_msgs(32),
 4871:     io:format("Got test 1 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs1]),
 4872: 
 4873:     ExpMsgs1 =
 4874:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4875:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4876:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4877:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4878:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 23)
 4879:         ++ MkResList(low, 2, 2)
 4880:         ++ MkResList(normal, 24, 26)
 4881:         ++ MkResList(low, 3, 4),
 4882:     
 4883:     case Msgs1 =:= ExpMsgs1 of
 4884:         true ->
 4885:             ok;
 4886:         false ->
 4887:             io:format("Expected test 1 messages ~p~n",
 4888:                       [ExpMsgs1]),
 4889:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4890:     end,
 4891: 
 4892:     receive Unexp1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp1})
 4893:     after 500 -> ok
 4894:     end,
 4895: 
 4896:     io:format("Test 1 as expected~n", []),
 4897: 
 4898:     %%% Test when low queue clears first...
 4899: 
 4900:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4901:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 20),
 4902: 
 4903:     Msgs2 = recv_msgs(23),
 4904:     io:format("Got test 2 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs2]),
 4905: 
 4906:     ExpMsgs2 =
 4907:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4908:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4909:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4910:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4911:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 20),
 4912:     
 4913:     case Msgs2 =:= ExpMsgs2 of
 4914:         true ->
 4915:             ok;
 4916:         false ->
 4917:             io:format("Expected test 2 messages ~p~n",
 4918:                       [ExpMsgs2]),
 4919:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4920:     end,
 4921: 
 4922:     receive Unexp2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp2})
 4923:     after 500 -> ok
 4924:     end,
 4925: 
 4926:     io:format("Test 2 as expected~n", []),
 4927: 
 4928:     unlink(Pid),
 4929:     exit(Pid, kill),
 4930:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 4931:     ok.
 4932:

 4940: alias_bif_test(Node) ->
 4941:     A1 = alias(),
 4942:     {P1, M1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4943:                              fun () ->
 4944:                                      A1 ! {A1, 1},
 4945:                                      A1 ! {A1, 2},
 4946:                                      [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4947:                                      A1 ! {A1, 3},
 4948:                                      A1 ! {A1, 4}
 4949:                              end),
 4950:     [{A1,1},{A1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4951:     unalias(A1),
 4952:     P1 ! {A1, continue},
 4953:     [{'DOWN', M1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4954: 
 4955:     A2 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 4956:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4957:                              fun () ->
 4958:                                      A2 ! {A2, 1},
 4959:                                      A2 ! {A2, 2},
 4960:                                      [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4961:                                      A2 ! {A2, 3},
 4962:                                      A2 ! {A2, 4}
 4963:                              end),
 4964:     [{A2,1},{A2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4965:     unalias(A2),
 4966:     P2 ! {A2, continue},
 4967:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 4968:     
 4969:     A3 = alias([reply]),
 4970:     {_P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4971:                               fun () ->
 4972:                                       A3 ! {A3, 1},
 4973:                                       A3 ! {A3, 2},
 4974:                                       A3 ! {A3, 3},
 4975:                                       A3 ! {A3, 4}
 4976:                               end),
 4977:     [{A3,1},{'DOWN', M3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 4978:     ok.

 4980: dist_frag_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4981:     Tester = self(),
 4982:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4983:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 4984:                           fun () ->
 4985:                                   Alias = alias(),
 4986:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 4987:                                   receive
 4988:                                       {data, Data} ->
 4989:                                           garbage_collect(),
 4990:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data}
 4991:                                   end,
 4992:                                   exit(end_of_test)
 4993:                           end),
 4994:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 4995:     receive
 4996:         {alias, Alias} ->
 4997:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 4998:             receive
 4999:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5000:                     Data = RecvData;
 5001:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5002:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5003:             end;
 5004:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5005:             ct:fail(R1)
 5006:     end,
 5007:     receive
 5008:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5009:             end_of_test = R3
 5010:     end,
 5011:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5012:     ok.

 5014: dist_frag_unaliased(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5015:     %% Leak fixed by PR-7915 would have been detected using asan or valgrind
 5016:     %% when running this test...
 5017:     Tester = self(),
 5018:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5019:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5020:                           fun () ->
 5021:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5022:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5023:                                   receive
 5024:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5025:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5026:                                           unalias(Alias),
 5027:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data},
 5028:                                           receive
 5029:                                               {data, _Data} ->
 5030:                                                   exit(received_data_again);
 5031:                                               end_of_test ->
 5032:                                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5033:                                           end
 5034:                                   end
 5035:                           end),
 5036:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5037:     receive
 5038:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5039:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5040:             receive
 5041:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5042:                     Data = RecvData;
 5043:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5044:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5045:             end,
 5046:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5047:             P ! end_of_test;
 5048:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5049:             ct:fail(R1)
 5050:     end,
 5051:     receive
 5052:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5053:             end_of_test = R3
 5054:     end,
 5055:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5056:     ok.

 5065: monitor_alias_test(Node) ->
 5066:     P1 = spawn(Node,
 5067:                fun () ->
 5068:                        [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5069:                        A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5070:                        A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5071:                        [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5072:                        A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5073:                        A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5074:                end),
 5075:     MA1 = monitor(process, P1, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5076:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5077:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5078:     unalias(MA1),
 5079:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5080:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5081: 
 5082:     P2 = spawn(Node,
 5083:                fun () ->
 5084:                        [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5085:                        A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5086:                        A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5087:                        [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5088:                        A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5089:                        A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5090:                end),
 5091:     MA2 = monitor(process, P2, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5092:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5093:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5094:     demonitor(MA2),
 5095:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5096:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5097:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5098: 
 5099:     P3 = spawn(Node,
 5100:                fun () ->
 5101:                        [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5102:                        A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5103:                        A3 ! {A3, 2}
 5104:                end),
 5105:     MA3 = monitor(process, P3, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5106:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5107:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5108:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5109:                                   fun () ->
 5110:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5111:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4}
 5112:                                   end),
 5113:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5114:     
 5115:     P4 = spawn(Node,
 5116:                fun () ->
 5117:                        [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1)
 5118:                end),
 5119:     MA4 = monitor(process, P4, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5120:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5121:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5122:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5123:                                   fun () ->
 5124:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5125:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4}
 5126:                                   end),

 5130:                fun () ->
 5131:                        [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5132:                        A5 ! {A5, 1},

 5134:                end),
