 5142: 
 5143: spawn_monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5144:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5145:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons.
 5146:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, normal),
 5147:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5148:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, normal),
 5149:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5150:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5151:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, normal),
 5152:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5153:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5154:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5155:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_request, normal),
 5156:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5157:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5158:     ok.
 5159: 
 5160: spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, ExitReason) ->
 5161:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5162:                 spawn_opt ->
 5163:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5164:                             try
 5165:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5166:                             catch
 5167:                                 error:Err ->
 5168:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5169:                             end
 5170:                     end;
 5171:                 spawn_request ->
 5172:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5173:                             try
 5174:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5175:                                 receive
 5176:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5177:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5178:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5179:                                         error(Error)
 5180:                                 end
 5181:                             catch
 5182:                                 error:Err ->
 5183:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5184:                             end
 5185:                     end
 5186:             end,
 5187: 
 5188:     SpawnError = fun (OptList) ->
 5189:                          try
 5190:                              Spawn(fun () -> ok end, OptList),
 5191:                              error(ignored_error)
 5192:                          catch
 5193:                              error:{SpawnType, badarg} when SpawnType == spawn_opt ->
 5194:                                  ok;
 5195:                              error:{SpawnType, badopt} when SpawnType == spawn_request ->
 5196:                                  ok
 5197:                          end
 5198:                  end,
 5199: 
 5200:     SpawnError([{monitor, {{alias, explicit_unalias}}}]),
 5201:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{alias,alias}]}]),
 5202:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{aliases,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5203:     SpawnError([{monitors, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5204:     
 5205:     {P1, MA1} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5206:                               [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5207:                               A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5208:                               A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5209:                               [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5210:                               A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5211:                               A1 ! {A1, 4},
 5212:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5213:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5214:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5215:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5216:     unalias(MA1),
 5217:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5218:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5219: 
 5220:     {P2, MA2} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5221:                               [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5222:                               A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5223:                               A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5224:                               [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5225:                               A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5226:                               A2 ! {A2, 4},
 5227:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5228:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5229:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5230:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5231:     demonitor(MA2),
 5232:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5233:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5234:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5235: 
 5236:     {P3, MA3} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5237:                               [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5238:                               A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5239:                               A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5240:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5241:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5242:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5243:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5244:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5245:                                   fun () ->
 5246:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5247:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4},
 5248:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5249:                                   end),
 5250:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5251:     
 5252:     {P4, MA4} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5253:                               [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5254:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5255:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5256:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5257:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5258:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5259:                                   fun () ->
 5260:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5261:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4},
 5262:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5263:                                   end),
 5264:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5265: 
 5266:     {P5, MA5} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5267:                               [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5268:                               A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5269:                               A5 ! {A5, 2},
 5270:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5271:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5272:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5273:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5274:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5275: 
 5276:     case Node == node() of
 5277:         true ->
 5278:             ok;
 5279:         false ->
 5280:             {P6, MA6} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5281:                                       [{alias, A6}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5282:                                       A6 ! {A6, 1},
 5283:                                       A6 ! {A6, 2},
 5284:                                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 5285:                               end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5286:             P6 ! {alias, MA6},
 5287:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5288:             [{MA6,1},{MA6,2},{'DOWN', MA6, _, _, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5289:             {_P6_1, M6_1} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 5290:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 3},
 5291:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 4}
 5292:                                           end),
 5293:             [{'DOWN', M6_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5294:     
 5295:             ok
 5296:     end.
 5297: 
 5298: demonitor_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5299:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5300:     Fun = fun () ->
 5301:                   receive
 5302:                       {alias, Alias} ->
 5303:                           Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5304:                   end
 5305:           end,
 5306:     LPid = spawn(Fun),
 5307:     RPid = spawn(Node, Fun),
 5308:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5309:     erlang:demonitor(AliasMonitor),
 5310:     LPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5311:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, LPid} -> ok end,
 5312:     %% Demonitor signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5313:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5314:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5315:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5316:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5317:     exit(LPid, kill),
 5318:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5319:     false = is_process_alive(LPid),
 5320:     ok.
 5321: 
 5322: down_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5323:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5324:     LPid = spawn(fun () -> receive infinty -> ok end end),
 5325:     RPid = spawn(Node,
 5326:                  fun () ->
 5327:                          receive
 5328:                              {alias, Alias} ->
 5329:                                  Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5330:                          end
 5331:                  end),
 5332:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5333:     exit(LPid, bye),
 5334:     receive {'DOWN', AliasMonitor, process, LPid, bye} -> ok end,
 5335:     %% Down signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5336:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5337:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5338:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5339:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5340:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5341:     ok.
 5342: 
 5343: monitor_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5344:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5345:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons, and
 5346:     %% immediate tags are stored in a different manner than
 5347:     %% compound tags.
 5348:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5349:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5350:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5351:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5352:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5353:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5354:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5355:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5356:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5357:     monitor_tag_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5358:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5359:     monitor_tag_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5360:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5361:     monitor_tag_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5362:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5363:     monitor_tag_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5364:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5365:     monitor_tag_test(Peer5, Node5, spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5366:     {ok, Peer6, Node6} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5367:     monitor_tag_test(Peer6, Node6, spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5368:     {ok, Peer7, Node7} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5369:     monitor_tag_test(Peer7, Node7, spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5370:     {ok, Peer8, Node8} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5371:     monitor_tag_test(Peer8, Node8, spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5372:     ok.
 5373: 
 5374: monitor_tag_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, Tag, ExitReason) ->
 5375: 
 5376:     P1 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive go -> ok end, exit(ExitReason) end),
 5377:     M1 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5378:     P1 ! go,
 5379:     [{Tag, M1, process, P1, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5380: 
 5381:     M1_2 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5382:     [{Tag, M1_2, process, P1, noproc}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5383: 
 5384:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5385:                 spawn_opt ->
 5386:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5387:                             try
 5388:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5389:                             catch
 5390:                                 error:Err ->
 5391:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5392:                             end
 5393:                     end;
 5394:                 spawn_request ->
 5395:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5396:                             try
 5397:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5398:                                 receive
 5399:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5400:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5401:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5402:                                         error(Error)
 5403:                                 end
 5404:                             catch
 5405:                                 error:Err ->
 5406:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5407:                             end
 5408:                     end
 5409:             end,
 5410: 
 5411:     {P2, M2} = Spawn(fun () -> exit(ExitReason) end, [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5412:     [{Tag, M2, process, P2, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5413: 
 5414:     case Node == node() of
 5415:         true ->
 5416:             ok;
 5417:         false ->
 5418:             {P3, M3} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5419:                              [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5420:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5421:             [{Tag, M3, process, P3, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5422: 
 5423:             case SpawnType == spawn_opt of
 5424:                 true ->
 5425:                     {P6, M6} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5426:                                      [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5427:                     [{Tag, M6, process, P6, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1);
 5428:                 false ->
 5429:                     ok
 5430:             end,
 5431:             ok
 5432:     end.
 5433: 
 5434: no_pid_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5435:     process_flag(priority, high),
 5436:     SOnln = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 5437:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5438:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5439:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5440:     ChkSpwndPid = fun () ->
 5441:                           check_spawned_pid(Pid)
 5442:                   end,
 5443:     MPs = maps:from_list(lists:map(fun (_) ->
 5444:                                            {P, M} = spawn_monitor(ChkSpwndPid),
 5445:                                            {M, P}
 5446:                                    end, lists:seq(1, SOnln))),
 5447:     Res = receive
 5448:               {'DOWN', M, process, _, pid_reused} when is_map_key(M, MPs) ->
 5449:                   case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 5450:                       8 ->
 5451:                           ct:fail("Process identifier reused"),
 5452:                           error;
 5453:                       4 ->
 5454:                           {comment,
 5455:                            "Process identifer reused, but this is"
 5456:                            ++ "expected since this is a 32-bit system"}
 5457:                   end;
 5458:               {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5459:                   ct:fail({unexpected_down, Down}),
 5460:                   error
 5461:           after
 5462:               3*60*1000 ->
 5463:                   ok
 5464:           end,
 5465:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5466:                          exit(P, kill)
 5467:                  end, MPs),
 5468:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5469:                          false = is_process_alive(P)
 5470:                  end, MPs),
 5471:     Res.
 5472: 
 5473: check_spawned_pid(OldPid) ->
 5474:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5475:     case OldPid == Pid of
 5476:         false ->
 5477:             check_spawned_pid(OldPid);
 5478:         true ->
 5479:             exit(pid_reused)
 5480:     end.
 5481: 
 5482: %% Internal functions
 5483: 
 5484: recv_msgs(N) ->
 5485:     recv_msgs(N, []).
 5486: 
 5487: recv_msgs(0, Msgs) ->
 5488:     lists:reverse(Msgs);
 5489: recv_msgs(N, Msgs) ->
 5490:     receive
 5491:         Msg ->
 5492:             recv_msgs(N-1, [Msg|Msgs])
 5493:     end.
 5494: 
 5495: wait_until(Fun) ->
 5496:     case Fun() of
 5497: 	true -> true;
 5498: 	false -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
 5499:     end.
 5500: 
 5501: tok_loop() ->
 5502:     tok_loop(hej).
 5503: 
 5504: tok_loop(hej) ->
 5505:     tok_loop(hopp);
 5506: tok_loop(hopp) ->
 5507:     tok_loop(hej).
 5508: 
 5509: id(I) -> I.
 5510: 
 5511: stop_node(Peer, Node) ->
 5512:     verify_nc(node()),
 5513:     verify_nc(Node),
 5514:     peer:stop(Peer).
 5515: 
 5516: verify_nc(Node) ->
 5517:     P = self(),
 5518:     Ref = make_ref(),
 5519:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 5520:                 fun() ->
 5521:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 5522:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 5523:                 end),
 5524:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 5525:     receive
 5526:         {Ref, ok} ->
 5527:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 5528:             ok;
 5529:         {Ref, Error} ->
 5530:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 5531:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 5532:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5533:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 5534:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 5535:     end.
 5536: 
 5537: enable_internal_state() ->
 5538:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 5539: 	true -> true;
 5540: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 5541:     end.
 5542: 
 5543: sys_mem_cond_run(OrigReqSizeMB, TestFun) when is_integer(OrigReqSizeMB) ->
 5544:     %% Debug normally needs more memory, so double the requirement
 5545:     Debug = erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 5546:     ReqSizeMB = if Debug -> OrigReqSizeMB * 2; true -> OrigReqSizeMB end,
 5547:     case total_memory() of
 5548: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem), TotMem >= ReqSizeMB ->
 5549: 	    TestFun();
 5550: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem) ->
 5551: 	    {skipped, "Not enough memory ("++integer_to_list(TotMem)++" MB)"};
 5552: 	undefined ->
 5553: 	    {skipped, "Could not retrieve memory information"}
 5554:     end.
 5555: 
 5556: 
 5557: total_memory() ->
 5558:     %% Total memory in MB.
 5559:     try
 5560: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 5561:         TM = proplists:get_value(
 5562:                available_memory, SMD,
 5563:                proplists:get_value(
 5564:                  total_memory, SMD,
 5565:                  proplists:get_value(
 5566:                    system_total_memory, SMD))),
 5567:         TM div (1024*1024)
 5568:     catch
 5569: 	_ : _ ->
 5570: 	    undefined
 5571:     end.
 5572: 
 5573: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5574:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 5575:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"),
 5576:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 5577:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 5578:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 5579:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 5580:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 5581:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 5582:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 5583:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 5584:     Parent = self(),
 5585:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5586:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 5587:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5588:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 5589:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 5590:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 5591:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 5592:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 5593:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 5594:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 5595:                              receive
 5596:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 5597:                              end,
 5598:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 5599:                      end),
 5600:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 5601:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5602:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 5603:         Error -> Error
 5604:     end.
 5605: 
 5606: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 5607:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5608:     case get(Key) of
 5609:         undefined ->
 5610:             {error, no_handler};
 5611:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5612:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 5613:             receive
 5614:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 5615:                     Res
 5616:             after 3000 ->
 5617:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 5618:             end
 5619:     end.
 5620: 
 5621: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 5622:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5623:         ok ->
 5624:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5625:             case get(Key) of
 5626:                 undefined ->
 5627:                     {error, no_handler};
 5628:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5629:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 5630:                     receive
 5631:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 5632:                             put(Key, undefined),
 5633:                             ok
 5634:                     after 2000 ->
 5635:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 5636:                     end
 5637:             end;
 5638:         Error ->
 5639:             Error
 5640:     end.
 5641: 
 5642: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 5643:     receive
 5644:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 5645:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5646:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5647:             exit(Reason);
 5648:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 5649:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5650:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5651:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 5652:             exit(normal);
 5653:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 5654:             Ref = make_ref(),
 5655:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 5656:             receive
 5657:                 Ref ->
 5658:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 5659:             after
 5660:                 2000 ->
 5661:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 5662:             end;
 5663:         Msg ->
 5664:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 5665:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5666:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5667:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 5668:     end,
 5669:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 5670: 
 5671: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 5672:     receive
 5673:         Msg ->
 5674:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 5675:     after
 5676:         0 ->
 5677:             Msgs
 5678:     end.
 5679: 
 5680: get_hostname() ->
 5681:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 5682: 
 5683: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 5684:     HostName;
 5685: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 5686:     get_hostname(Rest).
 5687: 
 5688: receive_any() ->
 5689:     receive M -> M end.
